◇数字1开启评论  ，不填则是关闭

//@天天gg@酷安 下面不要动
function parse(data){
	let args=data.split(separator);
	let title = args[0],url=args[1],num=nums;
	
	//链接生成
	 let u=/^\d+/.test(url)?"http://app-cdn.jjwxc.net/bookstore/getFullPage?channelBody=%7B%"+url+"%22%3A%7B%22offset%22%3A%22{{(page-1)*25}}>%22%2C%22limit%22%3A%2225%22%7D%7D&versionCode=227":url;
 try {num = args[2] }catch(e){}
 try {tag = args[3];
 
 u=tag=="bq♂"?'https://android.jjwxc.com/search/getSearchForKeyWords?versionCode=227&offset={{(page-1)*20}}&limit=20&bq='+url+'&removetags=0&fw=0&yc=0&xx=5&sd=0&lx=0&fg=0&mainview=1&fbsj=0&collectionTypes=ors&isfinish=0&sortType=0&token={\{cookie.getKey("https://m.jjwxc.net","sid")}\}':u;
 
 u=tag=="bq♀"?'https://android.jjwxc.com/search/getSearchForKeyWords?versionCode=227&offset={{(page-1)*20}}&limit=20&bq='+url+'&removetags=0&fw=0&yc=0&xx=5&sd=0&lx=0&fg=0&mainview=2&fbsj=0&collectionTypes=ors&isfinish=0&sortType=0&token={\{cookie.getKey("https://m.jjwxc.net","sid")}\}':u;
 
 u=tag=="lx♂"?'https://android.jjwxc.com/search/getSearchForKeyWords?versionCode=221&offset={{(page-1)*20}}&limit=20&bq=0&removetags=0&fw=0&yc=0&xx=5&sd=0&lx='+url+'&fg=0&mainview=1&fbsj=0&collectionTypes=ors&isfinish=0&sortType=0&token={\{cookie.getKey("https://m.jjwxc.net","sid")}}':u;
 
  u=tag=="lx♀"?'https://android.jjwxc.com/search/getSearchForKeyWords?versionCode=221&offset={{(page-1)*20}}&limit=20&bq=0&removetags=0&fw=0&yc=0&xx=5&sd=0&lx='+url+'&fg=0&mainview=2&fbsj=0&collectionTypes=ors&isfinish=0&sortType=0&token={\{cookie.getKey("https://m.jjwxc.net","sid")}}':u
 
 }catch(e){}
	return [title, u, num]
	}

function FlexBox(title, url, num){
		 let obj={};
		 obj.style={},obj.title=title,obj.url=url?url:'',obj.style['layout_flexGrow']=1;
	//数值设定
	let data={1:1,2:0.4,3:0.25,4:0.2,5:0.15,7:0.1,10:0.05};
obj.style['layout_flexBasisPercent']=data[num]
		return obj
		}
result=JSON.stringify(all.map(data=>{
	let args=parse(data);
	return FlexBox.apply(null, args)
	}))
</js>

if(baseUrl.match(/jjwxc/)){ var javaImport = new JavaImporter(); javaImport.importPackage( Packages.java.lang, Packages.javax.crypto.spec, Packages.javax.crypto, Packages.java.util ); with(javaImport){ let IV_PARAMETER = String("1ae2c94b"); let ALGORITHM = "DES"; let CIPHER_ALGORITHM = "DES/CBC/PKCS5Padding"; let CHARSET = "utf-8"; let password=String("KK!%G3JdCHJxpAF3%Vg9pN"); function decode(data){ let dks = new DESKeySpec(String(password).getBytes()); let keyFactory = SecretKeyFactory.getInstance("DES"); let secretKey = keyFactory.generateSecret(dks); let cipher = Cipher.getInstance(CIPHER_ALGORITHM); let iv = new IvParameterSpec(IV_PARAMETER.getBytes(CHARSET)); cipher.init(Cipher.DECRYPT_MODE, secretKey, iv); return new String(cipher.doFinal(Base64.getDecoder().decode(String(data).getBytes(CHARSET))), CHARSET); } } //DES解密结束 intro=java.get("intro"); intro=intro!=""?"☁"+intro+"．
":""; content=java.getElement("$.content"); saybody=java.getString("$.sayBody"); say=saybody!=""?"\n【作话】\n"+saybody:""; if(baseUrl.match(/token/)){ result=intro+String(decode(content)+say); }else{result=intro+content+say} flag_comment=source.getVariable() //获取评论开启 if(!baseUrl.match(/baidu/)){ if(flag_comment==1){ //匹配书籍id跟章节id bid=baseUrl.match(/novelId=(\d+)/)[1]; cid=baseUrl.match(/chapterId=(\d+)/)[1]; //拼接评论url url="https://s8-static.jjwxc.net/comment_json.php?novelid="+bid+"&chapterid="+cid; //获取评论列表 list=JSON.parse(java.ajax(url)).body; comment=""; //判断评论数量 len=list.length>15?15:list.length; for(i=0;i

<js>
gender=baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)[1]:""
category_id=baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_filters=baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)[1]:""
page=baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_category=baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)[1]:""
tag_id=baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
sign_key='d3dGiJc651gSQ8w1'
headers={'app-version':'51110','platform':'android','reg':'0','AUTHORIZATION':'','application-id':'com.****.reader','net-env':'1','channel':'unknown','qm-params':''}
headers['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(headers).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+headers[n],'')+sign_key))


var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {
  if(param==null) return '';
  var paramStr = '';
  var t = typeof (param);
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);
  } else {
    for (var i in param) {
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);
    }
  }
  return paramStr;
};

var category = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'category_id':category_id,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'need_category':need_category}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/category/get-list?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};

var tag = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'tag_id':tag_id}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/tag/index?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};


if(baseUrl.match(/category/)){
  category()
}else {
  tag()
}
</js>

bookSourceComment:
◎登录直接点登录，填账号密码，不要改登录规则里的东西，阅读升级最新版
◎网站只能搜作者
loginUrl:
<js>
userInfo=source.getLoginInfoMap()
java.log(userInfo)
UNE=userInfo['手机号码/邮箱号']
PWD=userInfo['密码']
url="https://afdian.net/api/passport/login,";
SU=source.getKey()
body={
  "account": String(UNE),
  "password": String(PWD),
  "mp_token": -1
}
option={
'method': 'POST',
'body': JSON.stringify(body)
}

url=url+JSON.stringify(option)
token=java.ajax(url).match(/"auth_token":"([^"]+)"/)[1]

Cookie={
	"Cookie":"auth_token="+token
	}
header = JSON.stringify(Cookie)
source.putLoginHeader(header)
</js>

ruleContent.content: if(baseUrl.match(/album-info/)){ text="↓复制下面网址，在书架选择◎添加网址◎，粘贴网址，即可阅读本书↓\n"+baseUrl+"\n简介："+JSON.parse(result).data.album.content }else if(baseUrl.match(/post_id/)){ json=JSON.parse(result) pics=json.data.post.pics; video=json.data.post.video?"视频链接："+json.data.post.video:"" preview_text=json.data.post.preview_text?json.data.post.preview_text:"" imgs=""; for(i in pics){ imgs+='\n' } result=json.data.post.content+imgs+video; result!=""?result:preview_text+"\n💰"+json.data.post.min_price+"\n"+json.data.post.has_right_errMsg }else{ result="↓↓复制下面文字，编辑书源，添加至发现规则↓↓\n"+book.name+"的作品集::"+baseUrl.replace(/page=1/,'page={\{page}}') }

ruleToc.updateTime:
{{$.content_length}}字 💰{{$.min_price}} 目录总数：{{$.post_count}}
<js>
time="{{$.publish_time}}"?java.timeFormat("{{$.publish_time}}000"):""
result=time+" "+result
</js>

ruleExplore.bookList:
<js>
gender=baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)[1]:""
category_id=baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_filters=baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)[1]:""
page=baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_category=baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)[1]:""
tag_id=baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
sign_key='d3dGiJc651gSQ8w1'
headers={'app-version':'51110','platform':'android','reg':'0','AUTHORIZATION':'','application-id':'com.****.reader','net-env':'1','channel':'unknown','qm-params':''}
headers['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(headers).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+headers[n],'')+sign_key))


var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {
  if(param==null) return '';
  var paramStr = '';
  var t = typeof (param);
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);
  } else {
    for (var i in param) {
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);
    }
  }
  return paramStr;
};

var category = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'category_id':category_id,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'need_category':need_category}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/category/get-list?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};

var tag = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'tag_id':tag_id}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/tag/index?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};


if(baseUrl.match(/category/)){
  category()
}else {
  tag()
}
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
jm=java.base64Decode(java.getString('[name="client"]@content'));
if(jm.length()>1){
var conts = [],list=[];
code=result.match(/codeurl="(\d+)";/)[1];
data=org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
datas=data.select("p[style*='text-indent']");
jm=String(jm).split(/[A-Z]+%/);
for(i=0;i<jm.length;i++){
	k=Math.ceil((i + 1) % parseInt(code));
	j=Math.ceil(jm[i] - k);
	conts[j]=datas[i];
	}
	for(i in conts){
		c=String(conts[i]).replace(/.*本章尚未读完,请.*一页继续阅读.*/g,'');
		list.push(c);
		list.join("\n");
		}
	}else{java.getString(".novelcontent@html")}
</js>

<js>
list=java.getElements("@@class.BGsectionThree-content@li").toArray();
intro=java.getElements('#intro').html();
href='';text='';
for(i in list){
href=href+list[i].select('a:eq(1)').attr('href')+'\n';
text=text+'【'+i+'】'+list[i].html()+'\n';
}
java.put('list',href);
xu=(book.getVariable("custom")==null||book.getVariable("custom")=="")?"0":book.getVariable("custom");
laiyuan='当前来源【'+xu+'】';
result='换源列表（点击设置书籍变量，输入序号，确认后刷新，可更改对应的源，默认为0）\n'+text+'\n'+laiyuan+'\n--------------\n'+intro
</js>

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
try{
cookie = cookie.getCookie("https://newsmiss.lofter.com");

lofter = String(cookie).match(/;\s(LOFTER-[^-]+-LOGIN-AUTH)=(.*?);/);

header = {};
header[lofter[1]] = lofter[2];
source.putLoginHeader(JSON.stringify(header))
result;
}catch(e){
	result = result
	}
</js>

ruleContent.content: content = java.getString("$..content"); imgs = eval(String(java.getString("$..photoLinks"))); video = "" if(/\.mp4/.test(baseUrl)){ video = "请点击章节链接观看视频\n视频链接："+baseUrl } img = ""; imgs?imgs.forEach(x=>{ x?img += "\n":"" }):"" result = content + "\n"+img + video;
ruleContent.nextContentUrl:
<js>
try{
		id = java.getString("$..post.id");
		id2 = java.getString("$..post.blogId");
url ="https://api.lofter.com/v1.1/trade/gift/post/newSupportInfo?postId="+id+"&blogId="+id2+"&openFansVipPlan=0&vipFans=0"
	$  = JSON.parse(String(java.ajax(url)));
	l = $.data.gainReturnGifts;
	ls = []
	l.forEach(x=>{
		url = "https://api.lofter.com/v1.1/trade/gift/myReturnGift?id="+x.id+"&postId="+id+"&blogId="+id2;
		ls.push(url)
		})
	result = ls
	}catch(e){
		}
</js>

ruleToc.nextTocUrl:
<js>
pages=java.get('page');
page=parseInt(pages/500);
url=String(java.get('url'));
list=[];

if(page>6){
page=6
}else{page=page}

for(i=1;i<=page;i++){
list.push(url.replace(/offset=\d+/,'offset='+(parseInt(i)*500)))
}

list
</js>

url="https:"+result.match(/initTxt\("([^"]+)","[^"]+"\)/)[1];
r=String(java.ajax(url).match(/_txt_call\(([\s\S]+\})\)/)[1]);
var r = eval('(' + r + ')');
				if(r.content!=null){				
      var e = r.replace;
				for (var n in e) {
					var i = new RegExp(e[n], "ig");
					r.content = r.content.replace(i, n)
				}
				result=r.content
					}else{result="章节加载失败，或者容正在手打中，请【收藏本站】稍访问或者联系管理员更新~"}
</js>

ruleContent.content: //获取图像token function getImageToken(path){ let a={ urls: '[\"'+path+"@748w.jpg"+'\"]' }, b={ "method": "POST", "body": JSON.stringify(a), "headers": {"Referer":"https://manga.bilibili.com/mc"+java.get("bid")+"/"+java.get("epid")+"?from=manga_detail"} } URL="https://manga.bilibili.com/twirp/comic.v1.Comic/ImageToken?device=pc&platform=web,"+JSON.stringify(b); java.setContent(java.ajax(URL)); url=java.getString("$..url"); token=java.getString("$..token"); return url+"?token="+token } b={ "headers": {"Referer":"https://manga.bilibili.com/mc"+java.get("bid")+"/"+java.get("epid")+"?from=manga_detail"} } //加了不会有水印?? java.getStringList("$.data.images[*].path").toArray().map(path=>{ return '' }).join("\n")

<js>
var Magua = new JavaImporter();
Magua.importPackage(
Packages.java.lang,
Packages.java.security,
);
with(Magua) {
  function strToMd5(str) {
    let md5 = MessageDigest.getInstance("MD5");
    let bytes = md5.digest(String(str).getBytes());
    let stringBuffer = new StringBuilder();
    let bt = null;
    bytes.forEach(a => {
      bt = a & 0xff;
      if (bt < 16) {
        stringBuffer.append("0");
      }
      stringBuffer.append(Integer.toHexString(bt));
    });
    return stringBuffer.toString();
  }
}
function getSig(timestamp, params) {
  return strToMd5("45667191c50941a1a777dfbd84345fe8" + timestamp + params);
}

if (baseUrl.match("key=")) {
  var input = decodeURI(baseUrl.split("key=")[1]).split("&page=")
  var timestamp = new Date().getTime();
  var params = JSON.stringify({
  keyword: String(input[0]),
  page: parseInt(input[1]),
  count: 30
  });
  var url = "http://api.ilikemanga.com/request.php?method=comic/search&timestamp="+timestamp+"&param="+params+"&sig="+getSig(timestamp,params);
  result=JSON.parse(java.ajax(url)).comics
} else if (baseUrl.match("date=")) {
  var input = decodeURI(baseUrl.split("date=")[1]).split("&page=")
  var timestamp = new Date().getTime();
  var params = JSON.stringify({
  v: 1,
  t: 0,
  id: 39,
  page: parseInt(input[1]),
  count: 30,
  filter: 0,
  date: parseInt(input[0])
  });
  var url = "http://api.ilikemanga.com/request.php?method=theme/infov1&timestamp="+timestamp+"&param="+params+"&sig="+getSig(timestamp,params);
 result= JSON.parse(java.ajax(url)).comics
} else if (baseUrl.match("id=")) {
  var input = decodeURI(baseUrl.split("id=")[1]).split("&page=")
  var timestamp = new Date().getTime();
  var params = JSON.stringify({
  v: 1,
  t: 0,
  id: parseInt(input[0]),
  page: parseInt(input[1]),
  count: 30,
  filter: 0
  });
  var url =  "http://api.ilikemanga.com/request.php?method=theme/info&timestamp=comic/search&timestamp="+timestamp+"&param="+params+"&sig="+getSig(timestamp,params);
  result=JSON.parse(java.ajax(url)).comics
} else {
  result=JSON.parse(result).data
}
JSON.stringify(result)
</js>$.[*]

ruleContent.content: //获取章节位置 index=parseInt(chapter.index); index=index+1; num=parseInt(book.totalChapterNum); index=num-index; //画质可选low middle high var img_ext = "-smh.middle.webp"; var pic = "https://mhpic.manhualang.com" var html =""; json=JSON.parse(result); comic_chapter= json.data.comic_chapter; var end_num = comic_chapter[index].end_num; var rule=comic_chapter[index].rule; chapter_domain=comic_chapter[index].chapter_domain; header={"Referer":baseUrl}; headers={"headers":JSON.stringify(header)}; for( let i = 1;i <= end_num; i++) { let url = pic +rule.replace(/\$\$/g,i) +img_ext; html += '\n'; } result = html

    intro: "",
    cover: String(list[i].select("img").attr("data-original")).replace(/http:/, "https:"),

  });
}
result = JSON.stringify(data);
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
Date.prototype.Format = function (fmt) {
  var o= {
    "M+": this.getMonth() + 1, //月份 
    "d+": this.getDate(), //日 
    "H+": this.getHours(), //小时 
    "m+": this.getMinutes(), //分 
    "s+": this.getSeconds(), //秒 
    "q+": Math.floor((this.getMonth() + 3) / 3), //季度 
    "S": this.getMilliseconds() //毫秒 
  };
  if (/(y+)/.test(fmt)) fmt = fmt.replace(RegExp.$1, (this.getFullYear() + "").substr(4 - RegExp.$1.length));
  for (var k in o)
  if (new RegExp("(" + k + ")").test(fmt)) fmt = fmt.replace(RegExp.$1, (RegExp.$1.length == 1) ? (o[k]) : (("00" + o[k]).substr(("" + o[k]).length)));
  return fmt;
};
date = new Date(new Date().getTime()).Format("yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss");
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment));
var list = java.getElements(".detail-list-1 li a"),
  data = [];
for (i in list) {
  data.push({
    title:
      i == list.length - 1 ? `${list[i].text()}〔${date}〕` : list[i].text(),
    link: list[i].attr("href")
  });
};
1 == flag
  ? (java.put("Enable", 1), JSON.stringify(data))
  : java.toast("\n❗未启用书源❗");
</js>
